solution_line_template: Cherry earns ${charge_3_5kg_cargo} x {num_5kg_cargo_per_day}= $<<{charge_3_5kg_cargo}*{num_5kg_cargo_per_day}={earnings_5kg_cargo_per_day}>>{earnings_5kg_cargo_per_day} after delivering four 5 kilograms of cargo per day.

She earns ${charge_6_8kg_cargo} x {num_8kg_cargo_per_day}= $<<{charge_6_8kg_cargo}*{num_8kg_cargo_per_day}={earnings_8kg_cargo_per_day}>>{earnings_8kg_cargo_per_day} after delivering two 8 kilograms of cargo per day.

So, her total earning per day is ${earnings_8kg_cargo_per_day}+${earnings_5kg_cargo_per_day}= $<<{earnings_8kg_cargo_per_day}+{earnings_5kg_cargo_per_day}={total_daily_earnings}>>{total_daily_earnings}.
Therefore, she will earn ${total_daily_earnings} x {days_per_week}= $<<{total_daily_earnings}*{days_per_week}={weekly_earnings}>>{weekly_earnings} in a week.
